Hazel sighs, annoyed. White tries to step forward and say something but Cer=
ulean pushes her back.


Hazel: I'm Hazel! And these are my comrades! Cerul=
ean, Bronze, Periwinkle, Pink, White and Brown. But just call Brown Mr. Shi=
t or Feces. Okay? Well, we're here because we wish to join your ranks.

  -=

  00C: I'm not in charge of the Chivi=
trons, but i can talk to your 
  characters until something else happens. =
=3D)

  --- Axis / Lokk ---

    Lokk picks up the noise on the exterior sp=
eakers, and sits 
  up, "Hey Axis we've got visitors.
    Axis jumps to his=
 feet, having zoned out. "Alright, we'd better 
  talk to them." He pauses,=
 "Uhh, where are the others?"
    "No clue," replies Lokk as he leaps to hi=
s feet and out the side 
  of tha hatch. Axis is close behind him.
    Lokk=
 jumps out of the hatch, and spots the newcomers, "Hey, who 
  are you and =
what was it you were saying before?"
    Axis comes out behind Lokk, and la=
nds on the ground behind Lokk.

, brb.
